sections.heading: guidelines.The Department of Health and Human Services and the State Department of Education shall establish guidelines for when a referral shall be made for early intervention services under the Early Intervention Act
sections.text: The guidelines shall include a request for an individual evaluation of a child s

71-4743.Referral guidelines.

The Department of Health and Human Services and the State Department of Education shall establish guidelines for when a referral shall be made for early intervention services under the Early Intervention Act. The guidelines shall include a request for an individual evaluation of a child suspected of being deaf or hard of hearing as defined in section 79-1118.01.

SourceLaws 2000, LB 950, ยง 10;Laws 2005, LB 301, ยง 50;Laws 2007, LB296, ยง 597.

Cross ReferencesEarly Intervention Act, see section 43-2501.
